About Automic's CA AGILECENTRAL Package ================================ CA Agile Central is an enterprise-class platform that's purpose-built for scaling agile development practices. Provide a hub for teams to collaboratively plan, prioritize and track work on a synchronized cadence. With this package we automate the given business goal: * Create User Story
=Supported CA AGILECENTRAL versions= Agile Central Version
=Limitations= (none)
=Setup= * Oracle JRE 1.7 or higher must be installed on Agent OS and "java" must be set as executable on the same. * The Agent should be able to access Agile Central rest api endpoint URL in order to make HTTP requests. * Modify the HTTP timeout parameters as per your environment. By default "CONNECTION_TIMEOUT" is defined as 30000 and "READ_TIMEOUT" is defined as 60000. Both are defined in milliseconds. 0 means no timeout.
=Variables= PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_AGILECENTRAL.PUB.VARA.PACKAGE_PARAMETERS * Connection timeout parameter can be configured in this variable. Value is defined in milliseconds. 0 means no timeout. * Version of the API to be used in Agile Central REST api. default value is latest.
=Actions= Following actions are supported for CA AGILECENTRAL.
* Action Name: PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_AGILECENTRAL.PUB.ACTION.CREATE_USER_STORY * Action Description: This action use to create new user story.
